entry.title: Liakhov/RAG-API: A lightweight RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) implementation in Node.js and TypeScript. This project combines ChromaDB for vector storage with Ollama LLMs to create a simple, efficient system for generating contextually relevant responses based on retrieved information
entry.content: A lightweight RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) implementation in Node.js and TypeScript. This project combines ChromaDB for vector storage with Ollama LLMs to create a simple, efficient system for generating contextually relevant responses based on retrieved information

entry.title: RohitM-IN/SQLParser: `sqlparser-devexpress` is a lightweight JavaScript library that converts SQL `WHERE` clauses into an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) and transforms them into a DevExpress-compatible filter format. It supports dynamic parameter extraction, short-circuit optimization, and efficient state-based filtering.
entry.content: `sqlparser-devexpress` is a lightweight JavaScript library that converts SQL `WHERE` clauses into an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) and transforms them into a DevExpress-compatible filter format. It supports dynamic parameter extraction, short-circuit optimization, and efficient state-based filtering.

entry.title: maniSHarma7575/OAuthx: A lightweight and developer-friendly OAuth 2.0 client library for secure authentication and seamless token management. OAuthx simplifies the integration of OAuth 2.0 authentication flows, including authorization code, PKCE and refresh token handling.
entry.content: A lightweight and developer-friendly OAuth 2.0 client library for secure authentication and seamless token management. OAuthx simplifies the integration of OAuth 2.0 authentication flows, including authorization code, PKCE and refresh token handling.

entry.title: surajraj-dev/Trackify-: - Your Task Management Solution Trackify is a lightweight Kanban-style task tracker to efficiently manage tasks and projects. It helps you organize tasks into To-Do, In Progress, and Completed sections, ensuring smooth workflow and progress tracking. ✨ Features: ✔ Easy task organization ✔ Visual progress tracking ✔ Clean & minimal UI ✔ Dynamic
entry.content: - Your Task Management Solution Trackify is a lightweight Kanban-style task tracker to efficiently manage tasks and projects. It helps you organize tasks into To-Do, In Progress, and Completed sections, ensuring smooth workflow and progress tracking. ✨ Features: ✔ Easy task organization ✔ Visual progress tracking ✔ Clean & minimal UI ✔ Dynamic
